trans-unit.source: Usage note: Do not use this attribute, as it has been deprecated: the <ul> element should be styled using CSS. To give a similar effect as the compact attribute, the CSS property line-height can be used with a value of 80%.
trans-unit.target: 用法说明：不要使用此属性，因为已弃用该属性： <ul> 元素应使用CSS设置样式。为了产生与 compact 属性类似的效果，可以使用CSS属性line-height，其值为 80% 。

trans-unit.source: Usage note: Do not use this attribute, as it is non-standard and is only implemented in some versions of Microsoft Internet Explorer; the <colgroup> elements should be styled using CSS. To give a similar effect to the bgcolor attribute, use the CSS property background-color on the relevant <td> elements.
trans-unit.target: 用法说明：不要使用此属性，因为它是非标准的，并且仅在某些版本的Microsoft Internet Explorer中实现；所述 <colgroup> 元件应该用样式CSS。要使bgcolor属性具有相似的效果，请在相关的 <td> 元素上使用CSS属性 background-color 。

trans-unit.source: Usage note: Do not use this attribute, as it is non-standard and only implemented some versions of Microsoft Internet Explorer: the <tbody> element should be styled using CSS. To give a similar effect to the bgcolor attribute, use the CSS property background-color, on the relevant <td> or <th> elements.
trans-unit.target: 用法说明：不要使用此属性，因为它是非标准属性，仅实现了某些版本的Microsoft Internet Explorer： <tbody> 元素应使用CSS设置样式。要使bgcolor属性具有相似的效果，请在相关的 <td> 或 <th> 元素上使用CSS属性 background-color 。

trans-unit.source: Usage note: Do not use this element. Though present in early HTML specifications, it has been deprecated in HTML 4, and has since been removed entirely. No major browsers support this element.
trans-unit.target: 使用注意事项：不要使用此元素。尽管它存在于早期的HTML规范中，但已在HTML 4中弃用，此后已被完全删除。没有主要的浏览器支持此元素。

trans-unit.source: Usage note: This attribute is obsolete in HTML5, instead omitting the href attribute is sufficient.
trans-unit.target: 用法说明：该属性在HTML5中已作废，而省略href属性就足够了。

trans-unit.source: Usage note: This attribute must not be used to convey semantic information. Even if all styling is removed, a page should remain semantically correct. Typically it shouldn't be used to hide irrelevant information; this should be done using the hidden attribute.

Usage note: This attribute must not be used to convey semantic information. Even if all styling is removed, a page should remain semantically correct. Typically it shouldn't be used to hide irrelevant information; this should be done using the hidden attribute.
trans-unit.target: 使用说明：不得使用此属性来传达语义信息。即使删除所有样式，页面在语义上也应保持正确。通常，不应将其用于隐藏不相关的信息；这应该使用hidden属性完成。

trans-unit.source: Usage note: This element has been removed in HTML5 and shouldn't be used anymore. Instead web developers should use the <abbr> element.
trans-unit.target: 用法说明：该元素已在HTML5中删除，不再应使用。相反，Web开发人员应使用 <abbr> 元素。

trans-unit.source: Usage note: This element is deprecated in HTML 4 and XHTML 1, and obsoleted in HTML5. If semantically appropriate, i.e., if it represents deleted content, use <del> instead. In all other cases use <s>.
trans-unit.target: 用法说明： HTML 4和XHTML 1中不推荐使用此元素，HTML5中已弃用该元素。如果在语义上适当，即如果它表示已删除的内容，请改用 <del> 。在所有其他情况下，请使用 <s> 。

trans-unit.source: Usage note: Unless the value attribute is between 0 and 1 (inclusive), the min and max attributes should define the range so that the value attribute's value is within it.
trans-unit.target: 用法说明：除非 value 属性在 0 到 1 （含）之间，否则 min 和 max 属性应定义范围，以便 value 属性的值在其范围内。

trans-unit.source: Usage note: Do not use this attribute, as it has been deprecated. The <table> element should be styled using CSS. To create an effect similar to the border attribute, the border, border-color, border-width and border-styleCSS properties should be used.
trans-unit.target: 用法说明：不要使用此属性，因为该属性已被弃用。所述 <table> 元件应该用样式CSS。要创建类似于border属性的效果，应使用 border ， border-color ， border-width 和 border-style CSS属性。

trans-unit.source: Usage note: Do not use this attribute, as it has been deprecated. The <table> element should be styled using CSS. To create an effect similar to the cellpadding attribute, apply the border-collapse property to the <table> element, with its value set to collapse, and the padding property to the <td> element.
trans-unit.target: 用法说明：不要使用此属性，因为该属性已被弃用。所述 <table> 元件应该用样式CSS。要创建类似于cellpadding属性的效果，请将 border-collapse 属性应用于 <table> 元素，并将其值设置为塌陷，并将 padding 属性应用于 <td> 元素。

trans-unit.source: Usage note: Do not use this attribute, as it has been deprecated. The <table> element should be styled using CSS. To create an effect similar to the cellspacing attribute, apply the border-spacing property to the <table> element. Border-spacing does not have any effect if border-collapse is set to collapse.
trans-unit.target: 用法说明：不要使用此属性，因为该属性已被弃用。所述 <table> 元件应该用样式CSS。要创建类似于cellspacing属性的效果，请将 border-spacing 属性应用于 <table> 元素。如果将 border-collapse 设置为塌陷，则Border-spacing无效。

trans-unit.source: Usage note: Do not use this attribute, as it has been deprecated. The <table> element should be styled using CSS. To create an effect similar to the frame attribute, use the border-style and border-width properties.
trans-unit.target: 用法说明：不要使用此属性，因为该属性已被弃用。所述 <table> 元件应该用样式CSS。若要创建类似于frame属性的效果，请使用 border-style 和 border-width 属性。

trans-unit.source: Usage note: Do not use this attribute, as it has been deprecated. The <table> element should be styled using CSS. Use the background-color property in CSS to create an effect that is similar to the bgcolor attribute.
trans-unit.target: 用法说明：不要使用此属性，因为该属性已被弃用。所述 <table> 元件应该用样式CSS。在CSS中使用 background-color 属性创建类似于 bgcolor 属性的效果。

trans-unit.source: Usage note: Do not use this attribute, as it has been deprecated; use the CSSlist-style-type property instead.

trans-unit.source: Usage note: Do not use this attribute, as it is non-standard and only implemented in some versions of Microsoft Internet Explorer: the <col> element should be styled using CSS. trans-unit.source: Usage note: Do not use this attribute, as it is non-standard and only implemented some versions of Microsoft Internet Explorer: the <tfoot> element should be styled using CSS. trans-unit.source: Warning: Automatically focusing a form control can confuse visually-impaired people using screen-reading technology and people with cognitive impairments. When autofocus is assigned, screen-readers "teleport" their user to the form control without warning them beforehand.

trans-unit.source: A <link> element can occur either in the <head> or <body> element, depending on whether it has a link type that is body-ok. For example, the stylesheet link type is body-ok, and therefore <link rel="stylesheet"> is permitted in the body. However, this isn't a good practice to follow; it makes more sense to separate your <link> elements from your body content, putting them in the <head>.
trans-unit.target: 甲 <link> 元素可在任一发生 <head> 或 <body> 元件，这取决于它是否有链路类型是身体-OK。例如， stylesheet 链接类型为body-ok，因此主体中允许 <link rel="stylesheet"> 。但是，这不是遵循的好习惯。将您的 <link> 元素与您的身体内容分开，并将它们放在 <head> 中，这更有意义。

trans-unit.source: A <noframes> element can contain any HTML elements that are allowed within the body of an HTML document, with the exception of the <frameset> and <frame> elements, since using frames when they aren't supported doesn't make sense.
trans-unit.target: 甲 <noframes> 元素可以包含被允许的HTML文档的主体内的任何HTML元素，具有异常的 <frameset> 和 <frame> 元素，由于使用帧时，不支持它们没有意义。

trans-unit.source: A <summary> element may only be used as the first child of a <details> element. When the user clicks on the summary, the parent <details> element is toggled open or closed, and then a toggle event is sent to the <details> element, which can be used to let you know when this state change occurs.
trans-unit.target: 甲 <summary> 元件可以仅被用作的第一个子 <details> 元素。当用户单击摘要时，父 <details> 元素被切换为打开或关闭，然后 toggle 事件被发送到 <details> 元素，该事件可用于通知您何时发生此状态更改。

trans-unit.source: A tabindex of 0 means that the element should be focusable and should be reachable by sequential keyboard navigation, but that the tab order is left up to the user agent, which should apply the user's platform conventions. This is usually the best value to use when you want an element to be focusable and to participate in keyboard navigation rather than trying to manage the tab order yourself.
trans-unit.target: 一个 tabindex 属性的0意味着元素应该成为焦点，应该是通过连续的键盘导航到达，但该选项卡顺序是留给用户代理，应当适用的用户的平台约定。通常，这是当您希望元素可聚焦并参与键盘导航而不是尝试自行管理选项卡顺序时使用的最佳值。

trans-unit.source: A context menu is a menu that appears upon user interaction, such as a right-click. HTML5 now allows us to customize this menu. Here are some implementation examples, including nested menus.
trans-unit.target: 一个上下文菜单是一个菜单，在用户交互出现，如右键单击。HTML5现在允许我们自定义此菜单。这是一些实现示例，包括嵌套菜单。

trans-unit.source: A negative value (usually tabindex="-1") means that the element is not reachable via sequential keyboard navigation, but could be focused with Javascript or visually by clicking with the mouse. It's mostly useful to create accessible widgets with JavaScript.

A negative value (usually tabindex="-1") means that the element should be focusable, but should not be reachable via sequential keyboard navigation. It's mostly useful to create accessible widgets with JavaScript.
trans-unit.target: 甲负值（通常 tabindex="-1" ）的装置，该元件应是可聚焦的，但不应该是通过顺序键盘导航可达。使用JavaScript创建可访问的小部件最有用。

trans-unit.source: A positive value means the element should be focusable in sequential keyboard navigation, with its order defined by the value of the number. That is, tabindex="4" is focused before tabindex="5" and tabindex="0", but after tabindex="3". If multiple elements share the same positive tabindex value, their order relative to each other follows their position in the document source. The maximum value for tabindex is 32767. If not specified, it takes the default value 0.

A positive value means the element should be focusable in sequential keyboard navigation, with its order defined by the value of the number. That is, tabindex="4" would be focused before tabindex="5", but after tabindex="3". If multiple elements share the same positive tabindex value, their order relative to each other follows their position in the document source.
trans-unit.target: 甲正值意味着元素应该是在顺序键盘导航可聚焦的，以其顺序由数的值来定义。也就是说， tabindex="4" 将集中在 tabindex="5" ，但在 tabindex="3" 。如果多个元素共享相同的正 tabindex 值，则它们相对的顺序将遵循它们在文档源中的位置。

A leap year is any year which is divisible by 400 or the year is divisible by 4 but not by 100. Although the calendar year is normally 365 days long, it actually takes the planet Earth approximately 365.2422 days to complete a single orbit around the sun. Leap years help to adjust the calendar to keep it synchronized with the actual position of the planet in its orbit. Adding a day to the year every four years essentially makes the average year 365.25 days long, which is close to correct.
A skip link is a link placed as early as possible in <body> content that points to the beginning of the page's main content. Usually, CSS hides a skip link offscreen until focused.

trans-unit.source: A URL associated with the event.

trans-unit.source: A URL associated with the tag. Required.
trans-unit.target: 与标签关联的URL。需要。

trans-unit.source: A URL for an image to be shown while the video is downloading. If this attribute isn't specified, nothing is displayed until the first frame is available, then the first frame is shown as the poster frame.
trans-unit.target: 视频下载时要显示的图像的URL。如果没有指定此属性,则在第一帧可用之前不显示任何内容,然后将第一帧作为海报帧显示。

trans-unit.source: A URL for an instant messaging protocol endpoint, such as "xmpp:username@example.net".
trans-unit.target: 即时通讯协议端点的URL,如 "xmpp:username@example.net"。

trans-unit.source: A URL fragment is a name preceded by a hash mark (#), which specifies an internal target location (an ID of an HTML element) within the current document. URLs are not restricted to Web (HTTP)-based documents, but can use any protocol supported by the browser. For example, file:, ftp:, and mailto: work in most browsers.
trans-unit.target: URL片段是一个名称，其前面带有井号（ # ），该井号指定了当前文档中的内部目标位置（HTML元素的ID）。URL不仅限于基于Web（HTTP）的文档，还可以使用浏览器支持的任何协议。例如， file: ， ftp: 和 mailto: 在大多数浏览器中均可使用。

trans-unit.source: A URL indicating a poster frame to show until the user plays or seeks.
trans-unit.target: 表示海报框的URL,要显示到用户播放或寻找。

trans-unit.source: A URL is constructed by starting with the URL given by the formaction or action attribute, appending a question mark ("?") character, then appending the form's data, encoded as described by formenctype or the form's enctype attribute. This URL is then sent to the server using an HTTP get request. This method works well for simple forms that contain only ASCII characters and have no side effects. This is the default value.
trans-unit.target: 通过从 formaction 或 action 属性给定的URL开始构造URL ，然后附加问号（“？”）字符，然后附加按 formenctype 或表单的 enctype 属性描述的表单数据。然后使用HTTP get 请求将此URL发送到服务器。此方法适用于仅包含ASCII字符且没有副作用的简单形式。这是默认值。

trans-unit.source: A URL of a long description of the frame's content. Due to widespread misuse, this is not helpful for non-visual browsers.
A URL that designates a source document or message for the information quoted. This attribute is intended to point to information explaining the context or the reference for the quote.
trans-unit.target: 指定所引用信息的源文件或信息的URL。该属性旨在指向解释上下文的信息或引用的参考资料。

trans-unit.source: A URL, such as a home page or company web site address as appropriate given the context of the other fields in the form.
trans-unit.target: 一个URL,如主页或公司网站地址,根据表格中其他字段的情况而定。

trans-unit.source: A WebM media file containing only audio.
trans-unit.target: 一个只包含音频的WebM媒体文件。

trans-unit.source: A WebM media file containing video (and possibly audio as well).
trans-unit.target: 一个包含视频(也可能是音频)的WebM媒体文件。

trans-unit.target: 一个基本的例子

trans-unit.target: 一个出生日期,作为一个完整的日期。

trans-unit.target: 块级元素总是从一个新的行开始,并占据整个可用的宽度(尽量向左和向右延伸)。

A button that submits the form.

A cache manifest file can include three sections (CACHE, NETWORK, and FALLBACK, discussed below). In the example above, there is no section header, so all data lines are assumed to be in the explicit (CACHE) section, meaning that the browser should cache all the listed resources in the application cache. Resources can be specified using either absolute or relative URLs (e.g., index.html).
trans-unit.target: 缓存清单文件可以包括三个部分（ CACHE ， NETWORK 和 FALLBACK ，下面讨论）。在上面的示例中，没有节头，因此所有数据行都假定在显式（ CACHE ）节中，这意味着浏览器应将所有列出的资源缓存在应用程序缓存中。可以使用绝对URL或相对URL（例如 index.html ）来指定资源。

trans-unit.source: A canonical link element is an HTML element that helps webmasters prevent duplicate content issues by specifying the "canonical" or "preferred" version of a web page as part of search engine optimization.
trans-unit.target: 规范链接元素是一种HTML元素,通过指定网页的 "规范 "或 "首选 "版本,帮助网站管理员防止重复内容问题,作为搜索引擎优化的一部分。

trans-unit.source: A caption can be associated with the <figure> element by inserting a <figcaption> inside it (as the first or the last child).
trans-unit.target: 通过将 <figcaption> 插入标题（作为第一个或最后一个子元素），可以将标题与 <figure> 元素关联。

trans-unit.source: A caption can be associated with the <figure> element by inserting a <figcaption> inside it (as the first or the last child). The first <figcaption> element found in the figure is presented as the figure's caption.
A challenge string that is submitted along with the public key.
trans-unit.target: 与公钥一起提交的挑战字符串。

trans-unit.source: A challenge string that is submitted along with the public key. Defaults to an empty string if not specified.
trans-unit.target: 与公钥一起提交的挑战字符串。如果没有指定,默认为空字符串。

trans-unit.source: A character indicating the sign of the offset: the plus character ("+", or U+002B) for time zones to the east of the prime meridian or the minus character ("-", or U+002D) for time zones to the west of the prime meridian.
A check box allowing single values to be selected/deselected.
A checkbox in the indeterminate state has a horizontal line in the box (it looks somewhat like a hyphen or minus sign) instead of a check/tick in most browsers.
trans-unit.target: 不确定状态下的复选框有一条横线(看起来有点像连字符或减号),而不是大多数浏览器中的复选/勾。

trans-unit.source: A class for the contact.
trans-unit.target: 一类为接触。

trans-unit.source: A color in hexadecimal string notation always begins with the character "#". After that come the hexadecimal digits of the color code. The string is case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: 十六进制字符串表示形式的颜色始终以字符 "#" 开头。之后是颜色代码的十六进制数字。字符串不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: A color input's value is considered to be invalid if the user agent is unable to convert the user's input into seven-character lower-case hexadecimal notation. If and when this is the case, the :invalid pseudo-class is applied to the element.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户代理无法将用户的输入转换为7个字符的小写十六进制表示法，则认为颜色输入的值无效。如果是这种情况，则 :invalid 伪类将应用于该元素。

trans-unit.source: A color that comes from imagery associated with what your content is about. If you're creating a web site about a given item or product, choose a color that's physically present on that item.
trans-unit.target: 一种来自于与你的内容相关联的图像的颜色。如果你正在创建一个关于特定项目或产品的网站,请选择一种实际存在于该项目上的颜色。

trans-unit.source: A color that comes from imagery associated with what your content is about. If you're creating a website about a given item or product, choose a color that's physically present on that item.
A color that is naturally associated with the topic of your content, such as the existing color identified with a product or idea or a color representative of the emotion you wish to convey.
trans-unit.target: 一种与你的内容主题自然相关的颜色,例如与产品或理念相识别的现有颜色,或者代表你想传达的情感的颜色。

trans-unit.source: A combination of the <figure> and <figcaption> elements, supplemented by a combination of an id and the ARIArole and aria-labelledby attributes allow the preformatted text to be announced as an image, with the figcaption serving as the image's alternate description.
trans-unit.target: 所述的组合 <figure> 和 <figcaption> 元素，通过组合添加 id 和ARIA role 和 aria-labelledby 属性允许预格式文本被宣布为图像，与 figcaption 用作图像的备用描述。

trans-unit.source: A comma-separated list of content types that the server accepts.
trans-unit.target: 以逗号分隔的服务器接受的内容类型列表。

trans-unit.source: A comma-separated list of selectors. These have the same syntax as CSS selectors. They select the content to insert in place of the <content> element.
trans-unit.target: 以逗号分隔的选择器列表。它们具有与CSS选择器相同的语法。他们选择要插入的内容来代替 <content> 元素。

trans-unit.source: A command can either be defined explicitly, with a textual label and optional icon to describe its appearance, or alternatively as an indirect command whose behavior is defined by a separate element. Commands can also optionally include a checkbox or be grouped to share radio buttons. (Menu items for indirect commands gain checkboxes or radio buttons when defined against elements <input type="checkbox"> and <input type="radio">.)
trans-unit.target: 可以使用文本标签和可选图标来显式定义命令以描述其外观，也可以将其定义为间接命令，其行为由单独的元素定义。命令还可以选择包含一个复选框，也可以分组以共享单选按钮。 （当针对元素 <input type="checkbox"> 和 <input type="radio"> 定义时，间接命令的菜单项将获得复选框或单选按钮。）

trans-unit.source: A common navigation technique for users of assistive technology is to read the page title and infer the content the page contains. This is because navigating into a page to determine its content can be a time consuming and potentially confusing process.

A common navigation technique for users of assistive technology is to read the page title and infer which content it contains. This is because navigating a page to determine its content can be a time consuming and potentially confusing process.
trans-unit.target: 对于辅助技术用户来说,一种常见的导航技术是阅读页面标题,并推断其包含的内容。这是因为浏览一个页面以确定其内容可能是一个耗时且可能令人困惑的过程。

trans-unit.source: A common navigation technique for users of screen reading software is jumping from heading to heading to quickly determine the content of the page. Because of this, it is important to not skip one or more heading levels. Doing so may create confusion, as the person navigating this way may be left wondering where the missing heading is.
trans-unit.target: 对于读屏软件的用户来说,一个常见的导航技巧是在标题之间跳转,以快速确定页面的内容。正因为如此,重要的是不要跳过一个或多个标题层次。这样做可能会造成混乱,因为以这种方式导航的人可能会想知道缺少的标题在哪里。

trans-unit.source: A company or organization name, such as "Acme Widget Company" or "Girl Scouts of America".
trans-unit.target: 公司或组织名称,如 "Acme Widget Company "或 "Girl Scouts of America"。

trans-unit.source: A computer program
trans-unit.target: 计算机程序

trans-unit.source: A control for entering a date (year, month, and day, with no time). Opens a date picker or numeric wheels for year, month, day when active in supporting browsers.
A control for entering a date and time (hour, minute, second, and fraction of a second) based on UTC time zone.
A control for entering a date and time, with no time zone. Opens a date picker or numeric wheels for date- and time-components when active in supporting browsers.
A control for entering a date consisting of a week-year number and a week number with no time zone.
A control for entering a month and year, with no time zone.

A control for entering a number whose exact value is not important. Displays as a range widget defaulting to the middle value. Used in conjunction min and max to define the range of acceptable values.
A control for entering a number. Displays a spinner and adds default validation when supported. Displays a numeric keypad in some devices with dynamic keypads.
A control for entering a telephone number. Displays a telephone keypad in some devices with dynamic keypads.
A control for entering a time value with no time zone.
A control for specifying a color; opening a color picker when active in supporting browsers.
A control that is not displayed but whose value is submitted to the server. There is an example in the next column, but it's hidden!
A control that lets the user select a file. Use the accept attribute to define the types of files that the control can select.
A country code.
trans-unit.target: 一个国家代码;

trans-unit.source: A country name.
trans-unit.target: 一个国家的名字。

trans-unit.source: A country or territory code.
A country or territory name.
A credit card number or other number identifying a payment method, such as an account number.
trans-unit.target: 信用卡号码或其他识别支付方式的号码,如账户号码;

trans-unit.source: A cross-origin request (i.e. with an Origin HTTP header) is performed, but no credential is sent (i.e. no cookie, X.509 certificate, or HTTP Basic authentication). If the server does not give credentials to the origin site (by not setting the Access-Control-Allow-Origin HTTP header) the image will be tainted and its usage restricted.
trans-unit.target: 执行跨域请求（即带有 Origin HTTP标头的请求），但不发送凭据（即不发送cookie，X.509证书或HTTP Basic身份验证）。如果服务器未将凭据提供给原始站点（未设置 Access-Control-Allow-Origin HTTP标头），则该图像将被污染并且其使用受到限制。

trans-unit.source: A cross-origin request (i.e. with an Origin HTTP header) is performed, but no credential is sent (i.e. no cookie, X.509 certificate, or HTTP Basic authentication). If the server does not give credentials to the origin site (by not setting the Access-Control-Allow-Origin HTTP header) the resource will be tainted and its usage restricted.

A cross-origin request (i.e. with an Origin HTTP header) is performed along with a credential sent (i.e. a cookie, certificate, and/or HTTP Basic authentication is performed). If the server does not give credentials to the origin site (through Access-Control-Allow-Credentials HTTP header), the resource will be tainted and its usage restricted.

A cross-origin request (i.e. with an Origin HTTP header) is performed along with a credential sent (i.e. a cookie, certificate, and/or HTTP Basic authentication is performed). If the server does not give credentials to the origin site (through Access-Control-Allow-Credentials HTTP header), the resource will be tainted and its usage restricted.
trans-unit.target: 执行跨域请求（即带有 Origin HTTP标头）和发送的凭据（即执行cookie，证书和/或HTTP基本身份验证）。如果服务器未将凭据提供给原始站点（通过 Access-Control-Allow-Credentials HTTP标头），则该资源将被污染并且其使用受到限制。

trans-unit.source: A cross-origin request (i.e., with Origin: HTTP header) is performed, but no credential is sent (i.e., no cookie, X.509 certificate, or HTTP Basic authentication). If the server does not give credentials to the origin site (by not setting the Access-Control-Allow-Origin HTTP header), the image will be tainted and its usage restricted.
trans-unit.target: 执行跨域请求（即使用 Origin: HTTP标头），但不发送凭据（即不发送cookie，X.509证书或HTTP Basic身份验证）。如果服务器未将凭据提供给原始站点（未设置 Access-Control-Allow-Origin HTTP标头），则该图像将被污染并且其使用受到限制。

trans-unit.source: A cross-origin request (i.e., with the Origin HTTP header) performed along with credentials sent (i.e., a cookie, certificate, or HTTP Basic authentication). If the server does not give credentials to the origin site (through the Access-Control-Allow-Credentials HTTP header), the image will be tainted and its usage restricted.
trans-unit.target: 与发送的凭据（即cookie，证书或HTTP基本身份验证）一起执行跨域请求（即具有 Origin HTTP标头）。如果服务器未（通过 Access-Control-Allow-Credentials HTTP标头）向原始站点提供凭据，则该图像将被污染并且其使用受到限制。

trans-unit.source: A cryptographic nonce (number used once) to whitelist inline scripts in a script-src Content-Security-Policy. The server must generate a unique nonce value each time it transmits a policy. It is critical to provide a nonce that cannot be guessed as bypassing a resource's policy is otherwise trivial.
trans-unit.target: 加密随机数（一次使用的数字），用于将script-src Content-Security-Policy中的内联脚本列入白名单。服务器每次发送策略时都必须生成一个唯一的随机数值。提供一个无法猜测的随机数非常重要，因为绕开资源策略是微不足道的。

trans-unit.source: A cryptographic nonce (number used once) to whitelist scripts in a script-src Content-Security-Policy. The server must generate a unique nonce value each time it transmits a policy. It is critical to provide a nonce that cannot be guessed as bypassing a resource's policy is otherwise trivial.

A cryptographic nonce (number used once) used to whitelist inline styles in a style-src Content-Security-Policy. The server must generate a unique nonce value each time it transmits a policy. It is critical to provide a nonce that cannot be guessed as bypassing a resource’s policy is otherwise trivial.
trans-unit.target: 一种用于将style-src Content-Security-Policy中的内联样式列入白名单的加密随机数（一次使用的数字）。服务器每次发送策略时都必须生成一个唯一的随机数值。提供一个无法猜测的随机数非常重要，因为绕开资源策略是微不足道的。

trans-unit.source: A default background-image gradient is applied to all <textarea> elements, which can be disabled using background-image: none.
trans-unit.target: 默认的背景图像渐变应用于所有 <textarea> 元素，可以使用 background-image: none 禁用它。

trans-unit.source: A defined property name, or
trans-unit.target: 定义的财产名称,或

trans-unit.source: A disclosure widget is typically presented onscreen using a small triangle which rotates (or twists) to indicate open/closed status, with a label next to the triangle. If the first child of the <details> element is a <summary>, the contents of the <summary> element are used as the label for the disclosure widget.
trans-unit.target: 公开窗口小部件通常使用小三角形显示在屏幕上，小三角形旋转（或扭曲）以指示打开/关闭状态，三角形旁边有标签。如果 <details> 元素的第一个子元素是 <summary> ，则 <summary> 元素的内容将用作公开窗口小部件的标签。

trans-unit.source: A document may have several <nav> elements, for example, one for site navigation and one for intra-page navigation. aria-labelledby can be used in such case to promote accessibility, see example.
trans-unit.target: 一个文档可以具有几个 <nav> 元素，例如，一个用于站点导航，一个用于页面内导航。在这种情况下，可以使用 aria-labelledby 来提高可访问性，请参见示例。

trans-unit.source: A document mustn't have more than one <main> element that doesn't have the hidden attribute specified.
A document's used base URL can be accessed by scripts with document.baseURI. If the document has no <base> elements, then baseURI defaults to location.href.
A domestic address.
trans-unit.target: 一个国内地址;

trans-unit.source: A double-precision floating-point value which indicates the duration (total length) of the audio in seconds, on the media's timeline. If no media is present on the element, or the media is not valid, the returned value is NaN. If the media has no known end (such as for live streams of unknown duration, web radio, media incoming from WebRTC, and so forth), this value is +Infinity.

A double-precision floating-point value which indicates the duration (total length) of the media in seconds, on the media's timeline. If no media is present on the element, or the media is not valid, the returned value is NaN. If the media has no known end (such as for live streams of unknown duration, web radio, media incoming from WebRTC, and so forth), this value is +Infinity.
A family name, as given on a credit card.

trans-unit.source: A few additional non-standard attributes are listed following the descriptions of the standard attributes.
A few browsers not only add a dotted underline, but also put it in small caps; to avoid this styling, adding something like font-variant: none in the CSS takes care of this case.
trans-unit.target: 一些浏览器不仅添加了虚线下划线，而且还大写了下划线。为了避免这种样式，请添加诸如 font-variant 之类的内容 : none CSS中的任何内容都不会处理这种情况。

A field for editing an email address. Looks like a text input, but has validation parameters and relevant keyboard in supporting browsers and devices with dynamic keyboards.
A field for entering a URL. Looks like a text input, but has validation parameters and relevant keyboard in supporting browsers and devices with dynamic keyboards.

A file input's value attribute contains a DOMString that represents the path to the selected file(s). If the user selected multiple files, the value represents the first file in the list of files they selected. The other files can be identified using the input's HTMLInputElement.files property.

trans-unit.source: A given document can have multiple articles in it; for example, on a blog that shows the text of each article one after another as the reader scrolls, each post would be contained in an <article> element, possibly with one or more <section>s within.

trans-unit.source: A global date and time string specifies a date and time as well as the time zone in which it occurs. A valid global date and time string is the same format as a local date and time string, except it has a time zone string appended to the end, following the time.

trans-unit.source: A string specifying a name for the input control. This name is submitted along with the control's value when the form data is submitted.

A string specifying the <form> element with which the input is associated (that is, its form owner). This string's value, if present, must match the id of a <form> element in the same document. If this attribute isn't specified, the <input> element is associated with the nearest containing form, if any.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，指定与输入关联的 <form> 元素（即其表单所有者）。该字符串的值（如果存在）必须与同一文档中 <form> 元素的 id 相匹配。如果未指定此属性，则 <input> 元素与最近的包含表单相关联（如果有）。

trans-unit.source: A string specifying the URL of the image file to display to represent the graphical submit button. When the user interacts with the image, the input is handled like any other button input.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串,指定要显示的图像文件的URL,以表示图形化的提交按钮。当用户与图像交互时,输入的内容会像其他按钮输入一样被处理。

trans-unit.source: A string specifying the earliest time to accept, given in the time value format described previously. If the value specified isn't a valid time string, no minimum value is set.

trans-unit.source: A string specifying the encoding type to use for the form data
trans-unit.target: 指定表格数据使用的编码类型的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A string specifying the file's path relative to the base directory selected in a directory picker (that is, a file picker in which the webkitdirectory attribute is set). This is non-standard and should be used with caution.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，指定相对于在目录选择器（即在其中设置了 webkitdirectory 属性的 file 选择器）中选择的基本目录的文件路径。这是非标准的，应谨慎使用。

trans-unit.source: A string specifying the type of control to render. For example, to create a checkbox, a value of checkbox is used. If omitted (or an unknown value is specified), the input type text is used, creating a plaintext input field.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，指定要呈现的控件的类型。例如，为了创建一个复选框，值 checkbox 被使用。如果省略（或指定了未知值），则使用输入类型的 text ，从而创建纯文本输入字段。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains no "." (U+002E FULL STOP) characters and no ":" characters (U+003A COLON) and is used as a proprietary item property name (again, one not defined in a public specification).
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，不包含“ . ”（U + 002E FULL STOP）字符，也不包含“ : ”字符（U + 003A COLON），并且用作专有项目属性名称（同样，公共规范中未定义）。

trans-unit.source: A string that defines the file types the file input should accept. This string is a comma-separated list of unique file type specifiers. Because a given file type may be identified in more than one manner, it's useful to provide a thorough set of type specifiers when you need files of a given format.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，它定义文件输入应接受的文件类型。该字符串是用逗号分隔的唯一文件类型说明符列表。由于给定的文件类型可能以多种方式标识，因此在需要给定格式的文件时提供一组完整的类型说明符很有用。

trans-unit.source: A string that describes what if any type of autocomplete functionality the input should provide. A typical implementation of autocomplete simply recalls previous values entered in the same input field, but more complex forms of autocomplete can exist. For instance, a browser could integrate with a device's contacts list to autocomplete email addresses in an email input field. See Values in The HTML autocomplete attribute for permitted values.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，描述输入应提供的自动完成功能的类型。自动完成功能的典型实现方式是简单地调用在同一输入字段中输入的先前值，但是可以存在更复杂形式的自动完成功能。例如，浏览器可以与设备的联系人列表集成，以在电子邮件输入字段中自动完成电子邮件地址。见价值观中的HTML autocomplete属性的允许值。

trans-unit.source: A string that identifies the encoding method to use when submitting the form data to the server. There are three permitted values:
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串,用于标识向服务器提交表单数据时要使用的编码方法。有三个允许的值。

trans-unit.source: A string that specifies which camera to use for capture of image or video data, if the accept attribute indicates that the input should be of one of those types. A value of user indicates that the user-facing camera and/or microphone should be used. A value of environment specifies that the outward-facing camera and/or microphone should be used. If this attribute is missing, the user agent is free to decide on its own what to do. If the requested facing mode isn't available, the user agent may fall back to its preferred default mode.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，它指定要使用哪个摄像机捕获图像或视频数据（如果 accept 属性指示输入应该是这些类型之一）。 user 值表示应使用面向用户的摄像头和/或麦克风。 environment 值指定应使用朝外的摄像头和/或麦克风。如果缺少此属性，则用户代理可以自行决定要做什么。如果请求的面对模式不可用，则用户代理可能会退回到其首选的默认模式。

trans-unit.source: A string to display to the user as an error message when the field doesn't pass validation. Firefox only.
trans-unit.target: 当字段未通过验证时显示为错误消息的字符串。仅Firefox。

trans-unit.source: A string value of any means that no stepping is implied, and any value is allowed (barring other constraints, such as min and max).

A string which specifies a name or keyword that indicates where to display the response received after submitting the form. trans-unit.source: A thread about isindex in November 1992, Kevin Hoadley questioned the need for an isindex element and proposed to drop it. He proposed to have instead an input element (idea supported by Steve Putz). Tim Berners-Lee explains the purpose of isindex resulting in aggregated search results. Kevin replies that he doesn't like the boolean nature of isindex and would prefer a system where everything is searchable and proposes to extend the current WWW Framework with a specific httpd configuration and defined that some URIs mapping create search queries.
trans-unit.target: 1992年11月，Kevin Hoadley 提出了一个关于isindex的话题，质疑是否需要isindex元素，并建议删除它。他建议改为使用输入元素（由Steve Putz 支持的想法）。蒂姆·伯纳斯·李（Tim Berners-Lee）解释了isindex产生汇总搜索结果的目的。 Kevin 回答说，他不喜欢isindex的布尔性质，而是希望使用一种可以搜索所有内容的系统，并建议使用特定的httpd配置扩展当前的WWW框架，并定义一些URI映射创建搜索查询。

trans-unit.source: A time string can specify a time with precision to the minute, second, or to the millisecond. Specifying only the hour or minute isn't permitted. A valid time string minimally consists of a two-digit hour followed by a colon (":", U+003A), then a two-digit minute. The minute may optionally be followed by another colon and a two-digit number of seconds. Milliseconds may be specified, optionally, by adding a decimal point character (".", U+002E) followed by one, two, or three digits.

A time zone offset string specifies the offset in either a positive or a negative number of hours and minutes from the standard time base. There are two standard time bases, which are very close to the same, but not exactly the same:

trans-unit.source: After declaring a few variables, an event listener is added to the button to control the switching mechanism. This is pretty simple, mostly involving changing over the button's class and <label>, and updating the display values of the two sets of inputs when the button is pressed.

After declaring a few variables, we add an event listener to the button to control the switching mechanism. This is pretty simple, mostly involving changing over the button class and label, and updating the display values of the two sets of inputs when the button is pressed. Note that we're not converting back and forth between meters and feet/inches here, which a real-life web application would probably do.
trans-unit.target: 在声明了几个变量之后,我们为按钮添加一个事件监听器来控制切换机制。这很简单,主要涉及到改变按钮类和标签,以及在按钮被按下时更新两组输入的显示值。请注意,我们并没有在米和英尺/英寸之间来回转换,这在现实生活中的Web应用程序可能会做。

trans-unit.source: Although the <header> element didn't make its way into specifications until HTML5, it actually existed at the very beginning of HTML. As seen in the very first website, it was originally used as the <head> element. At some point, it was decided to use a different name. This allowed <header> to be free to fill a different role later on.

An HTML element is set off from other text in a document by "tags", which consist of the element name surrounded by "<" and ">". The name of an element inside a tag is case insensitive. That is, it can be written in uppercase, lowercase, or a mixture. For example, the <title> tag can be written as <Title>, <TITLE>, or in any other way.

trans-unit.source: Application cache implementation overview
trans-unit.target: 应用缓存实施概述

trans-unit.source: Application caches can also become obsolete. If an application's manifest file is removed from the server, the browser removes all application caches that use that manifest, and sends an "obsoleted" event to the applicationCache object. This sets the application cache's state to OBSOLETE.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序缓存也可能过时。如果从服务器中删除了应用程序的清单文件，则浏览器将删除所有使用该清单的应用程序缓存，并将“已过时”事件发送到 applicationCache 对象。这 OBSOLETE 应用程序缓存的状态设置为OBSOLETE。

trans-unit.source: Application caching lets web-based applications run offline. You can use the Application Cache (AppCache) interface to specify resources that the browser should cache and make available to offline users. Applications that are cached load and work correctly even if users click the refresh button when they are offline.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序缓存使基于Web的应用程序可以脱机运行。您可以使用应用程序缓存（AppCache）界面来指定浏览器应缓存的资源，并可供脱机用户使用。即使用户脱机时单击刷新按钮，缓存的应用程序也会加载并正常工作。

trans-unit.source: Applies To
Applies extra restrictions to the content in the frame. The value of the attribute can either be empty to apply all restrictions, or space-separated tokens to lift particular restrictions:
Apply the correct content security policy to the resource.

trans-unit.source: As a "pure" container, the <div> element does not inherently represent anything. As a rule, if the user is more likely to be interested in the percentage of the distance between minimum and maximum values than the actual number itself, a range input is a great candidate. For example, in the case of a home stereo volume control, users typically think "set volume at halfway to maximum" instead of "set volume to 0.5".
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下,如果用户更可能对最小值和最大值之间的距离百分比感兴趣,而不是实际数字本身,那么量程输入就是一个很好的选择。例如,在家用立体声音量控制的情况下,用户通常会想到 "将音量设置在最大值的一半",而不是 "将音量设置为0.5"。

trans-unit.source: As soon as you draw into a canvas any data that was loaded from another origin without CORS approval, the canvas becomes tainted. A tainted canvas is one which is no longer considered secure, and any attempts to retrieve image data back from the canvas will cause an exception to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 一旦将任何未经CORS批准从其他来源加载的数据绘制到画布中，画布就会被污染。脏画布是一种不再被认为是安全的画布，任何从画布中检索图像数据的尝试都将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: As stated previously, placing the secret in a hidden input doesn't inherently make it secure. The key's composition and encoding would do that. The value of the hidden input is that it keeps the secret associated with the data and automatically includes it when the form is sent to the server. You need to use well-designed secrets to actually secure your website.
trans-unit.target: 如前所述,将秘密放在一个隐藏的输入中并不能从本质上保证其安全。密钥的组成和编码会做到这一点。隐藏输入的价值在于,它保留了与数据相关联的秘密,并在表单发送到服务器时自动包含它。你需要使用精心设计的秘密来真正保证网站的安全。

trans-unit.source: As the directionality of the text is semantically related to its content and not to its presentation, it is recommended that web developers use this attribute instead of the related CSS properties when possible. That way, the text will display correctly even on a browser that doesn't support CSS or has the CSS deactivated.
trans-unit.target: 由于文本的方向性在语义上与内容有关,而与表现形式无关,因此建议Web开发人员尽可能使用该属性而不是相关的CSS属性。这样,即使在不支持CSS或已停用CSS的浏览器上,文本也能正确显示。

trans-unit.source: As the example above shows, the <fieldset> element provides a grouping for a part of an HTML form, with a nested <legend> element providing a caption for the <fieldset>. It takes few attributes, the most notable of which are form, which can contain the id of a <form> on the same page, allowing you to make the <fieldset> part of that <form> even if it is not nested inside it, and disabled, which allows you to disable the <fieldset> and all its contents in one go.
trans-unit.target: 如上面的示例所示， <fieldset> 元素为HTML表单的一部分提供分组，而嵌套的 <legend> 元素为 <fieldset> 提供标题。它具有很少的属性，其中最引人注目的是 form ，它可以包含同一页面上的 <form> 的 id ，即使您没有将 <fieldset> 嵌套在其中，也可以使它成为该 <form> 的一部分。和 disabled ，您可以一次性禁用 <fieldset> 及其所有内容。

trans-unit.source: As web developers, it's important that we never assume that people will know all the things that we know. trans-unit.target: 作为Web开发人员，重要的是，我们永远不要以为人们会知道我们所知道的一切。实际上，使用网络的人以及通过扩展您的网站而来的人们的多样性，保证了您网站的某些访问者的思维过程和/或情况会有所不同，从而导致他们对您的表格的理解与您的理解大相径庭，显示标签。

At a fundamental level, the color property defines the foreground color of an HTML element's content and the background-color property defines the element's background color. These can be used on just about any element.

trans-unit.source: At a high level, microdata consists of a group of name-value pairs. The groups are called items, and each name-value pair is a property. Items and properties are represented by regular elements.
trans-unit.target: 在高层次上,微观数据由一组名-值对组成。这些组称为项目,每个名值对是一个属性。项目和属性用常规元素表示。

trans-unit.source: At the element level, everything in HTML can have color applied to it. Instead, let's look at things in terms of the kinds of things that are drawn in the elements, such as text and borders and so forth. For each, we'll see a list of the CSS properties that apply color to them.
trans-unit.target: 在元素层面,HTML中的所有东西都可以应用颜色。相反,让我们从元素中绘制的东西的种类来看,比如文本和边框等等。对于每一种东西,我们将看到对它们应用颜色的CSS属性列表。

trans-unit.source: Audio with spoken dialog should provide both captions and transcripts that accurately describe its content. Captions allow people who are experiencing hearing loss to understand an audio recording's content as the recording is being played, while transcripts allow people who need additional time to be able to review the recording's content at a pace and format that is comfortable for them.

trans-unit.source: Authors should not use UTF-32 because not all HTML5 encoding algorithms can distinguish it from UTF-16.

trans-unit.source: Authors should not use ASCII-incompatible encodings to avoid security risk: browsers not supporting them may interpret harmful content as HTML. This happens with the JIS_C6226-1983, JIS_X0212-1990, HZ-GB-2312, JOHAB, the ISO-2022 family and the EBCDIC family.
trans-unit.target: 作者不应该使用与ASCII不兼容的编码来避免安全风险：不支持它们的浏览器可能会将有害内容解释为HTML。 JIS_C6226-1983 ， JIS_X0212-1990 ， HZ-GB-2312 ， JOHAB ，ISO-2022系列和EBCDIC系列都会发生这种情况。

Because step defaults to 1, valid values include 7.2, 8.2, 9.2, and so on. The value 8 is not valid. As we included an invalid value, supporting browsers will show the value as invalid.

Because a disabled field cannot have its value changed, required does not have any effect on inputs with the disabled attribute also specified. Additionally, since the elements become immutable, most other attributes, such as pattern, have no effect, until the control is enabled.

Because a given file type may be identified in more than one manner, it's useful to provide a thorough set of type specifiers when you need files of specific type, or use the wild card to denote a type of any format is acceptable.
Because a read-only field cannot have a value, required does not have any effect on inputs with the readonly attribute also specified.
Because a read-only field cannot have it's value changed by a user interaction, required does not have any effect on inputs with the readonly attribute also specified.

Because each browsing context is a complete document environment, every <iframe> in a page requires increased memory and other computing resources. While theoretically you can use as many <iframe>s as you like, check for performance problems.

Because each embedded browsing context created by <iframe> is itself a complete document environment, every use of <iframe> within a page can cause substantial increases in the amount of memory and other computing resources required by the document overall, so while theoretically you can use as many <iframe> as you like on a page, you should keep the potential for performance issues in mind.
trans-unit.target: 因为 <iframe> 创建的每个嵌入式浏览上下文本身就是一个完整的文档环境，所以在页面中每次使用 <iframe> 都会导致整个文档所需的内存和其他计算资源的数量大量增加，因此从理论上讲，您可以在页面上使用尽可能多的 <iframe> ，则应牢记潜在的性能问题。

trans-unit.source: Because of the limited browser support for datetime-local, and the variations in how the inputs work, it may currently still be best to use a framework or library to present these, or to use a custom input of your own. Another option is to use separate date and time inputs, each of which is more widely supported than datetime-local.
trans-unit.target: 由于浏览器对 datetime-local 的支持有限，并且输入的工作方式各不相同，因此，目前最好还是使用框架或库来呈现这些内容或使用您自己的自定义输入。另一种选择是使用单独的 date 和 time 输入，与 datetime-local 相比，每种输入均受更广泛的支持。

trans-unit.source: Before 77, Firefox didn't display the value of the label attribute as option text if element's content was empty. See bug 40545.

Before Firefox 12, if JavaScript is disabled, the <canvas> element was being rendered instead of showing the fallback content as per the specification. Since then, the fallback content is rendered instead.
trans-unit.target: 在Firefox 12之前，如果禁用了JavaScript，则会呈现<canvas>元素，而不是按照规范显示后备内容。从那时起，将显示后备内容。

trans-unit.source: Before Firefox 17, the default styling of the <map> HTML element was display: block;. This is now display: inline; and matches the behavior of the other browsers. It was already the case in Quirks Mode.
trans-unit.target: 在Firefox 17之前， <map> HTML元素的默认样式为 display: block; 。现在 display: inline; 并匹配其他浏览器的行为。在怪癖模式中已经是这种情况。

trans-unit.source: Before Firefox 22, creating an <image> element incorrectly resulted in an HTMLSpanElement object, instead of the expected HTMLElement.
trans-unit.target: 在Firefox 22之前，创建<image>元素错误地导致了 HTMLSpanElement 对象，而不是预期的 HTMLElement 。

trans-unit.source: Before Firefox 24, although not implemented, an object of class HTMLCommandElement was created, instead of the compliant HTMLUnknownElement.
trans-unit.target: 在Firefox 24之前的版本中，尽管未实现，但创建了 HTMLCommandElement 类的对象，而不是兼容的 HTMLUnknownElement 。

trans-unit.source: Before Firefox 35, it was supported in Quirks Mode only.
trans-unit.target: 在Firefox 35之前,只支持Quirks模式。

trans-unit.source: Before Firefox 4, creating a <kbd> element incorrectly resulted in an HTMLSpanElement object, instead of the expected HTMLElement.
trans-unit.target: 在Firefox 4之前，错误地创建<kbd>元素会导致 HTMLSpanElement 对象，而不是预期的 HTMLElement 。

trans-unit.source: Before Firefox 4, creating a <strong> element incorrectly resulted in an HTMLSpanElement object, instead of the expected HTMLElement.
trans-unit.target: 在Firefox 4之前，创建 <strong> 元素会错误地导致 HTMLSpanElement 对象，而不是预期的 HTMLElement 。

trans-unit.source: Before Firefox 4, this element implemented the HTMLSpanElement interface instead of the standard HTMLElement interface.
trans-unit.target: 在Firefox 4之前，此元素实现 HTMLSpanElement 接口，而不是标准 HTMLElement 接口。

trans-unit.source: Before Firefox 4, this element was implemented using the HTMLSpanElement interface instead of HTMLElement.
trans-unit.target: 在Firefox 4之前的版本中，此元素是使用 HTMLSpanElement 接口而不是 HTMLElement 实现的。

trans-unit.source: Before Firefox 41, it doesn't obey the crossorigin attribute.
trans-unit.target: 在Firefox 41之前，它不遵循 crossorigin 属性。

trans-unit.source: Before Firefox 5, in Quirks Mode, empty maps were longer skipped over in favor of non-empty ones when matching.
trans-unit.target: 在Firefox 5之前,在Quirks模式下,匹配时不再跳过空地图,而选择非空地图。

trans-unit.source: Before Firefox 5, in Quirks Mode, empty maps were no longer skipped over in favor of non-empty ones when matching.
Before Firefox 5, the canvas width and height were signed integers instead of unsigned integers.
trans-unit.target: 在Firefox 5之前,画布的宽度和高度是有符号的整数,而不是无符号的整数。

trans-unit.source: Before Firefox 57, there was a bug meaning that <details> elements can't be made open by default using the open attribute if they have a CSS animation active on them.
trans-unit.target: 在Firefox 57之前的版本中，存在一个错误，意味着如果 <details> 元素上具有激活的CSS animation ，则默认情况下无法使用 open 属性将其打开。

trans-unit.source: Before Firefox 6, when a <textarea> was focused, the insertion point was placed at the end of the text by default. Other major browsers place the insertion point at the beginning of the text.
trans-unit.target: 在Firefox 6之前，当 <textarea> 成为焦点时，默认情况下，插入点位于文本的末尾。其他主要浏览器将插入点放置在文本的开头。

trans-unit.source: Before Internet Explorer 7, <base> can be positioned anywhere in the document and the nearest value of <base> is used.
trans-unit.target: 在Internet Explorer 7之前，可以将 <base> 放置在文档中的任何位置，并使用最近的 <base> 值。

trans-unit.source: Before a <dt> or a <dd> element, inside a <dl> or (in WHATWG HTML) a <div> that is inside a <dl>.
trans-unit.target: 在 <dt> 或 <dd> 元素之前，在 <dl> 内（或在WHATWG HTML中）在 <dl> 内的< <div> 中。

trans-unit.source: Before getting into the intricacies of how date and time strings are written and parsed in HTML, here are some examples that should give you a good idea what the more commonly-used date and time string formats look like.

Before looking at the various formats of date and time related strings used by HTML elements, it is helpful to understand a few fundamental facts about the way they're defined. HTML uses a variation of the ISO 8601 standard for its date and time strings. It's worth reviewing the descriptions of the formats you're using in order to ensure that your strings are in fact compatible with HTML, as the HTML specification includes algorithms for parsing these strings that is actually more precise than ISO 8601, so there can be subtle differences in how date and time strings are expected to look.
Before really getting into styling this table, let's take a moment to add row and column groups to help make our CSS easier.
trans-unit.target: 在真正开始设计这个表格之前,让我们先花点时间来添加行和列组,以帮助我们的CSS更容易。

trans-unit.source: Before the alpha option was standardized, you could use the moz-opaque attribute on the canvas tag. However, this only works in Mozilla-based rendering engines and should be avoided; check bug 878155 to track when this attribute will be removed.
trans-unit.target: 在对 alpha 选项进行标准化之前，您可以 在canvas标签上使用 moz-opaque 属性。但是，这仅在基于Mozilla的渲染引擎中有效，应避免使用。检查错误878155，以跟踪何时删除该属性。
